org.transitime.ipc.servers

Class PredictionsServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.transitime.ipc.rmi.AbstractServer
      • org.transitime.ipc.servers.PredictionsServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote, PredictionsInterface

    public class PredictionsServer
extends AbstractServer
implements PredictionsInterface
    Implements the PredictionsInterface interface on the server side such that a PredictionsInterfaceFactory can make RMI calls in order to obtain prediction information.
    Author:
    SkiBu Smith

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface org.transitime.ipc.interfaces.PredictionsInterface

    • Method Detail

      • start

        public static PredictionsServer start(java.lang.String projectId,
                      PredictionManager predictionManager)
        Starts up the PredictionsServer so that RMI calls can query for predictions. This will automatically cause the object to continue to run and serve requests.
        Parameters:
        projectId -
        predictionManager -
        Returns:
        the singleton PredictionsServer object. Usually does not need to used since the server will be fully running.

      • get

        public java.util.List<java.util.List<Prediction>> get(java.util.List<PredictionsInterface.RouteStop> routeStops,
                                             int predictionsPerStop)
                                               throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Description copied from interface: PredictionsInterface
        For each route/stop specified returns a list of predictions for that stop. Since expensive RMI calls are being done this method is much more efficient for obtaining multiple predictions then if a separate get() call is done for each route/stop.
        Specified by:
        get in interface PredictionsInterface
        Parameters:
        routeStops - List of route/stops to return predictions for
        predictionsPerStop - Max number of predictions to return per route/stop
        Returns:
        List of List of PredictionsInterface for the route/stop.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

                                                           throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Description copied from interface: PredictionsInterface
        For each route/stop specified returns a list of predictions for that stop. Since expensive RMI calls are being done this method is much more efficient for obtaining multiple predictions then if a separate get() call is done for each route/stop.
